item.title: Senran Kagura title Project N announced for iOS, Android
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone

Due out in 2026 in Japan.

Publisher Marvelous and developer Honey∞Parade Games have announced Project N, a new title in the Senran Kagura series for iOS and Android. It will launch in 2026 in Japan.

Project N follows the story of five new shinobi girls, three years after the events of Shinobi Master Senran Kagura: NEW LINK. Character design is handled by Nan Yaegashi.

Gekkou and Senkou, who appeared as high school students at the end of Shinobi Master Senran Kagura: NEW LINK, will also appear in the new game.

The press release reads: “New shinobis, a new school, and a mysterious girl in the teaser visual… Detailed information such as the official title and release date will be announced later on.”



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/senran-kagura-title-project-n-announced-for-ios-android
